com.almasb.fxgl.entity.component

Class PositionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.ents.AbstractComponent
      • com.almasb.fxgl.entity.component.PositionComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.almasb.ents.Component

    public class PositionComponent
extends com.almasb.ents.AbstractComponent
    Component that adds a 2d position to an entity.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
